entry.title: Feedback requested: "reject" p2p message
entry.summary: In a message sent on October 27, 2013, Gavin Andresen asked for suggestions regarding the rejection categories of Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs). He requested that anyone with strong opinions on the matter draft a specific list of rejection reasons, as he was unable to read their minds. Andresen also suggested using the rejection reasons outlined in BIP 22 where applicable. The link to these examples can be found on the Bitcoin Wiki page for BIP 22.
